name: Blackstar (itch)
description:
Blackstar is a small and simple metroidvania with no bugs (i hope).

You will start your journy traped and defenseless, but soon you will find your first weapon.  You will then be able to break the chains that kept you captive (aka some breakable looking blocks) and keep exploring this world filled with new abilities and upgrades.

You will find many foes, including the Aieon Colossus, the keeper of the ultimate weapon, and the mysterious and powerful Bossu, who will be your final challenge before beating this tiny yet charming game.
